'''Breezy Snapshots Photo Event''' is a [[Web Event]] in [[Version 3.5]].

The [[Windblume's Breath|Windblume Festival]]'s here again! Have you been enjoying yourself during this festival season?

I heard that to celebrate this year's Windblume Festival, you have picked up your [[Kamera]]s and captured quite some breathtaking moments.

Care to share those precious pictures with us? Participants will also have the opportunity to win [[Primogem]] rewards prepared by yours truly!

* Results: The list of winners will be announced in this event post on March 30.

==How to Participate==
Share the photos you took during the "Breezy Snapshots" event in the comment section of this post and give other Travelers your Windblume blessings.

The more stunning the photos, the higher the chances of winning!

==Event Rewards==
* The 100 most impressive participants will be gifted {{Item|Primogem|x=100}} each.
